item.title: 日美寻求落实协议，大米仍是症结所在
item.description: 大米仍然是日本和美国争论的焦点，因为他们在如何理解 7 月达成的贸易协议上纠缠不清，而该协议的大部分内容尚未生效。【原文：Rice remains a point of contention for Japan and the US as they wrestle over how they understand their July trade deal, most of which has yet to take effect.】

item.title: 法国总理承认本周会谈可能会失败
item.description: 法国总理弗朗索瓦-巴伊鲁（Francois Bayrou）在努力为9月8日的信任投票争取支持时采取了好斗的语气，同时承认与各政党的会谈可能无法挽救他的政府，使其免于下台。【原文：French Prime Minister Francois Bayrou struck a combative tone in his effort to gain support for a Sept. 8 confidence vote, while acknowledging that talks with political parties may fail to save his government from being ousted.】

item.title: 比亚迪停滞不前，新鹏和小型电动汽车制造商在中国实现销售目标
item.description: 当比亚迪公司在中国新能源汽车市场上遭遇困境时，其他规模较小的企业正通过满足对廉价汽车的需求来超越其销售目标。【原文：As BYD Co. weathers a rough patch atop China’s market for new-energy vehicles, other, smaller players are surpassing their sales goals by leaning into demand for cheaper cars.】

item.title: 50 亿美元血本无归后，欧拉电器股票面临赎回
item.description: Ola Electric Mobility Ltd. 的股价正从 50 亿美元的暴跌中回升，因为投资者押注这家印度电动摩托车制造商正迎来转机。【原文：Ola Electric Mobility Ltd.’s shares are recovering from a $5 billion rout as investors bet the Indian e-scooter maker is turning a corner.】

item.title: 美国撤销中国芯片生产许可后，三星和 SK 海力士陷入困境
item.description: 三星电子公司和 SK 海力士公司的股价周一下滑，因为特朗普政府决定加大全球最大的内存芯片制造商向其在中国的巨型运营企业运送关键设备的难度。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. and SK Hynix Inc. shares slid Monday after the Trump administration decided to make it harder for the world’s largest memory chipmakers to ship critical equipment to their giant Chinese operations.】

item.title: 中国原油期货显示第一大进口国基本面疲软
item.description: 投资者若想深入了解中国石油市场的基本面，只需关注在上海上市的期货。【原文：Investors seeking insight into China’s oil market fundamentals need look no further than futures listed in Shanghai.】

item.title: 中国钢铁库存增加，工厂效益下滑，铁矿石下跌
item.description: 铁矿石期货面临下跌压力，因为中国的钢材库存不断增加，而且一系列经济数据显示中国正在努力摆脱疲软状态。【原文：Iron ore futures faced downward pressure as inventories of steel accumulated in China and a slew of the country’s economic data showed it was struggling to shrug off weakness.】

item.title: 莫迪-习近平会晤后，印度投资者关注与中国相关的企业
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印尼近期抗议活动对经济的影响有限
item.description: 印尼经济事务统筹部长艾尔朗加-哈塔托（Airlangga Hartarto）表示，由于印尼的基本面稳固，预计印尼将能经受住近期抗议和骚乱的影响。【原文：Indonesia is expected to weather the impact of recent protests and riots, thanks to its solid fundamentals, according to Coordinating Minister for Economic Affairs Airlangga Hartarto.】

item.title: 塞泽尔称中国人民币对公平贸易而言 "弱得难以置信
item.description: 美国外交关系委员会高级研究员 Brad Setser 认为，中国应允许人民币对其主要合作伙伴的货币升值，而且升值幅度应远远超过 1 美元兑 7 元人民币，以促进公平贸易。【原文：China should allow the yuan to strengthen against its key partners’ currencies and well beyond 7 per dollar to foster fair trade, according to Brad Setser, senior fellow at the Council on Foreign Relations.】

item.title: 美国降息押注刺激投资者需求，白银升破 40 美元
item.description: 由于市场对美联储本月降息的预期增强，白银交易价格自 2011 年以来首次突破每盎司 40 美元，从而提振了投资者对贵金属的偏好。【原文：Silver traded above $40 an ounce for the first time since 2011 as expectations grew for an interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve this month, boosting investor appetite for precious metals.】

item.title: 中国私营工厂指数意外恢复增长
item.description: 一项民间调查显示，8 月份中国制造业活动意外重回扩张区间，反弹幅度远超预期，与官方调查形成鲜明对比。【原文：China’s manufacturing activity unexpectedly moved back into expansion territory in August, according to a private survey, rebounding far more than forecast in contrast with an official poll.】

item.title: 在人工智能领域取得进展后，阿里巴巴股价创 2022 年以来最大涨幅
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）在报告人工智能收入激增后，股价跃升超过 18%，凸显了该公司在《深度学习》（DeepSeek）之后的中国开发狂潮中，正在与竞争对手稳步前进。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.’s stock leapt more than 18% after reporting a surge in revenue from AI, underscoring the steady progress it’s making against rivals in a post-DeepSeek Chinese development frenzy.】

item.title: 金正恩在习近平和普京会晤前参观新导弹工厂
item.description: 据朝鲜国家媒体周一报道，朝鲜领导人金正恩视察了一家新的导弹工厂，这在他计划访问北京（预计将会见中国和俄罗斯领导人）之前凸显了朝鲜不断提高的武器能力。【原文：North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has inspected a new missile factory, state media reported Monday, underscoring the country’s advancing weapons capabilities ahead of his planned trip to Beijing, where he is expected to meet Chinese and Russian leaders.】

item.title: 日韩降温，东南亚制造业强劲增长
item.description: 亚洲的制造业活动分布在该地区的各个中心，其中印尼和泰国的制造业活动强劲，而韩国和日本则因关税影响产出而降温。【原文：Asia’s manufacturing activity split across the region’s various hubs with Indonesia and Thailand powering ahead while South Korea and Japan cooled as tariffs weighed on output.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美联储前景和美国关税，黄金维持在历史纪录附近
item.description: 在本周晚些时候将公布关键的美国就业数据之前，交易员们权衡了美联储的未来和美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税的不确定性，黄金维持在略低于纪录的水平。【原文：Gold held just below a record as traders weighed the future of the Federal Reserve and uncertainty around US President Donald Trump’s tariffs ahead of key US jobs data due later this week.】

item.title: 日本股市低开，投资者远离科技股
item.description: 日本股市低开，原因是上周末美国股市中英伟达（Nvidia）和戴尔科技（Dell Technologies）下跌后，投资者避开了芯片和科技股。【原文：Japanese equities opened lower as investors steered clear of chip and tech shares following declines in Nvidia and Dell Technologies on the U.S. stock market over the weekend.】

item.title: 新西兰住房建设审批陷入 15 个月的沉睡
item.description: 新西兰的住房建设审批仍处于一年多前的低迷状态，有迹象表明关键建筑行业的疲软可能会持续下去。【原文：New Zealand home-building approvals remain in a slumber that extends back more than a year, adding to signs that weakness in the key construction industry may persist.】

item.title: 日本 680 亿美元养老金削减表现不佳的主动型基金
item.description: 日本最大的养老基金之一削减了其持有的积极投资基金，同时其最高管理层承诺加强对资产管理公司业绩的审查。【原文：One of Japan’s biggest pension funds has slashed its holdings of actively invested funds while its top management pledged to tighten scrutiny of asset managers’ performance.】

item.title: 美国加征关税，日本企业削减资本支出
item.description: 随着特朗普政府的关税行动愈演愈烈，日本企业缩减了资本投资。【原文：Japanese businesses pared back their capital investment as the Trump administration’s tariff campaign intensified.】

item.title: 对冲基金押注日元即将实现看涨突破
item.description: 对冲基金开始押注日元有望摆脱窄幅波动，兑美元走高。【原文：Hedge funds are starting to bet the yen is poised to snap out of its narrow trading range and march higher against the dollar.】

item.title: 尽管美国加征关税，韩国芯片需求旺盛，出口保持稳健
item.description: 在半导体和汽车出货量强劲的推动下，韩国出口保持增长，这凸显了制造商在美国全面关税面前的韧性。【原文：South Korea’s exports held up, buoyed by strong semiconductor and auto shipments, underscoring manufacturers’ resilience in the face of sweeping US tariffs.】

item.title: 石油月度下跌后趋于平稳，供应过剩和地缘政治成为焦点
item.description: 石油止住了月度跌势后趋于稳定，交易商关注的焦点是对潜在供应过剩和地缘政治紧张局势的担忧。【原文：Oil steadied after capping a monthly drop, with traders focused on concerns over a potential glut and geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 游说团体称：加快税制改革，英国可从石油和天然气中获得更多收益
item.description: 据一个行业游说团体称，如果工党政府明年尽快取代对北海生产商征收的有争议的暴利税，而不是等待，那么到 2050 年，英国从石油和天然气公司获得的税收将增加近 25%。【原文：The UK can generate almost 25% more in taxes from oil and gas companies through 2050 if the Labour government replaces a contentious windfall levy on North Sea producers as soon as next year rather than waiting, according to an industry lobby group.】

item.title: 美国关税裁决后，亚洲开盘谨慎：市场综述
item.description: 美国联邦上诉法院裁定唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面贸易关税是非法的，不确定性加深，亚洲投资者周一可能会谨慎行事。【原文：Asian investors may tread cautiously on Monday as uncertainty deepens following a U.S. federal appeals court ruling that President Donald Trump’s sweeping trade tariffs were illegal.】

item.title: 总理称新西兰将在几周内任命新的新西兰央行行长
item.description: 新西兰总理克里斯托弗-卢克森（Christopher Luxon）表示，新西兰预计将在数周内任命一位新的储备银行行长。【原文：New Zealand expects to appoint a new Reserve Bank governor within weeks, Prime Minister Christopher Luxon said.】

item.title: 东京证券交易所要求披露更多管理层收购信息
item.description: 就在要求对管理层收购交易进行更多披露的几周后，东京证券交易所仍面临压力，要求在管理层收购过程中采取更多措施保护小股东。【原文：The Tokyo Stock Exchange remains under pressure to do more to protect minority shareholders during management buyouts, just weeks after requiring more disclosures on such deals.】

item.title: 大米通胀促使日本寿司连锁店依赖海外增长
item.description: 日本顶级传送带寿司连锁店寿司郎（Sushiro）正依靠其快速海外扩张所带来的利润来缓解国内大米成本飙升所带来的压力。【原文：Japan’s top conveyor-belt sushi chain, Sushiro, is leaning on profits from its rapid overseas expansion to take the bite out of surging rice costs at home.】

item.title: CapVest 接近 100 亿欧元收购药品制造商 Stada
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，CapVest Partners 公司即将以约 100 亿欧元（约合 117 亿美元）的价格（包括债务）收购 Stada Arzneimittel AG 公司，从而有可能结束这家德国制药商的长期出售传奇。【原文：CapVest Partners is nearing a deal to acquire Stada Arzneimittel AG for around €10 billion ($11.7 billion) including debt, potentially ending the long-running saga to sell the German drugmaker, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着需求激增，三菱重工将把燃气轮机产能增加一倍
item.description: 三菱重工株式会社（Mitsubishi Heavy Industries Ltd.）的目标是在未来两年内将其燃气轮机产能翻一番，因为全球对这种设备的需求因替换和数据中心需求而增加。【原文：Mitsubishi Heavy Industries Ltd. aims to double its gas turbine capacity in the next two years as demand for the equipment rises globally due to replacement and data center needs.】
